addons.name: Rise of the Tools
addons.description: Moves the toolbar back above the tabbar.
addons.fullDescription:
Moves the toolbar for mails back up above the tabbar. Note that this might cause the design to suffer when using a theme not supporting this extsion. So the default theme has issues with aero on windows (and looks as terrible as it looked before the changes in 1.11).

Note that additional custom toolbars might still go into the tab, and tabs still do have toolbars other than the toolbar for mails (like the calendar when Lightning is installed). I personally use it with my theme Ignore Aero on windows, to prevent the aero glitch to reappear.

addons.name: MS Office 2003 JB Edition
addons.fullDescription:
Brand new theme. Created from scratch based on Thunderbird 24.

Microsoft Office 2003 Theme.

Inspired by:
Outlook 2003 BlueTB - https://addons.mozilla.org/pl/thunderbird/addon/outlook-2003-bluetb/



===============================================================
                     PROBLEMS AFTER UPDATE?
===============================================================
Sometimes after update thunderbird switches to default theme
even if "MS Office 2003 JB Edition" is still activated. In such
case please proceed with following steps:
- turn on default theme
- restart thunderbird
- turn on "MS Office 2003 JB Edition"
- restart thunderbird


===============================================================
                         FOUND A BUG?
===============================================================
Do not rate the theme with one star. It doesn't force me to fix
it quickly. Even worse, such attitude discourages me from further
development. If you found a bug just make a screenshot and send
it to

pohybel_wp@wp.pl

and I will fix it in next release.


===============================================================
                 MISSING CLOSE / MINIMIZE BUTTONS?
===============================================================

This theme doesn't support "Tabs in title bar" so in case if
title bar buttons are missing please:
- go to Preferences->Advanced tab->(button) Settings editor
- type: "mail.tabs.drawInTitlebar"
- set its value to "false"

===============================================================

addons.name: Lightning
addons.description: Organize your schedule and life's important events in a calendar that's fully integrated with your Thunderbird email. Manage multiple calendars, create your daily to do list, invite friends to events, and subscribe to public calendars.
addons.fullDescription:
Make Thunderbird even more powerful with the fully integrated Lightning Calendar. Lightning allows you to organize your schedule directly within Thunderbird.


=====================================================
If you are using Linux and Thunderbird 24, be sure to use the exact version combination:
Thunderbird 24.0: Lightning 2.6
Thunderbird 24.0.1: Lightning 2.6.1
Thunderbird 24.1.0: Lightning 2.6.2
Thunderbird 24.1.1 and later Thunderbird 24 versions: Lightning 2.6.3 - 2.6.6
=====================================================

=====================================================
Lighting 1.9.1 for Thunderbird 17 is available here
=====================================================

Lightning also supports older versions of Thunderbird like 3.1 or 17, please see the complete version history for details.
